Package com.gsm.service

Interface SaleOrderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SaleOrderServiceImpl
    public interface SaleOrderService
    Service layer interface for managing Sale Order-related business logic. Defines the contract for all operations that can be performed on sale orders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
      Deletes one or more sale orders based on a list of IDs.
      java.util.List<SaleOrderDto> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all sale orders, simplified for list view display.
      SaleOrderDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Finds a single sale order by its unique identifier, with full details.
      SaleOrderDto findBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
      Finds a single sale order by its unique sale order number.
      SaleOrderDto save​(SaleOrderDto dto)
      Saves a new sale order or updates an existing one.
      java.util.List<SaleOrderDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
      Searches for sale orders based on a keyword.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        java.util.List<SaleOrderDto> findAll()
        Retrieves a list of all sale orders, simplified for list view display.
        Returns:
        A list of SaleOrderDto objects.

      • findById

        SaleOrderDto findById​(java.lang.Long id)
        Finds a single sale order by its unique identifier, with full details.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the sale order to find.
        Returns:
        The SaleOrderDto with full details, including line items.

      • save

        SaleOrderDto save​(SaleOrderDto dto)
        Saves a new sale order or updates an existing one.
        Parameters:
        dto - The DTO containing the sale order data to be saved.
        Returns:
        The saved SaleOrderDto, including any database-generated values.

      • deleteByIds

        void deleteByIds​(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids)
        Deletes one or more sale orders based on a list of IDs.
        Parameters:
        ids - A list of sale order IDs to be deleted.

      • search

        java.util.List<SaleOrderDto> search​(java.lang.String keyword)
        Searches for sale orders based on a keyword.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The term to search for (e.g., in sale order number or customer name).
        Returns:
        A list of SaleOrderDtos that match the keyword.

      • findBySaleOrderNo

        SaleOrderDto findBySaleOrderNo​(java.lang.String saleOrderNo)
        Finds a single sale order by its unique sale order number.
        Parameters:
        saleOrderNo - The unique number of the sale order.
        Returns:
        The SaleOrderDto (simplified version) matching the number.
